required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple-Dose Study of Effect of Bardoxolone Methyl on QT/QTC Interval Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Blinded Randomized Parallel Trial to Define the ECG Effects of Bardoxolone Methyl Using a Clinical and a Supratherapeutic Dose Compared to Placebo and Moxifloxacin (a Positive Control) in Healthy Men and Women: A Thorough ECG Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, multiple-dose, randomized, double-blind, double-dummy, placebo-controlled, active-comparator, parallel study in healthy volunteers.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
